entry.title: AER Next-Level Deodorant (Palo Santo Blood Orange)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vapour Organic Beauty
Type: Deoderant
Price: 24.00

Revolutionary gel-to-powder formula

Let go of convention. Vapour’s innovative formula transforms from gel to powder on your skin and delivers lasting results. Silky and lightweight, AER’s potent plant + mineral complex effectively combats odor and bacteria at the source.

AER Performance

AER’s perfected base of active powders and essential oils in suspension is the result of a five-year process to elevate the performance and integrity of the deodorant category. Like other Vapour products, AER is highly concentrated—a little goes a long way.

AER Experience

The optimal combination of form and functionality, AER glides on easily, transforming from gel to powder on your skin. The effect is a light-as-air barrier, allowing skin to breathe while confronting odor-causing bacteria in a lasting way. AER contains no talc, synthetic or toxic ingredients, which are the primary building blocks of conventional deodorants and antiperspirants.

AER Plant + Mineral Complex

A potent blend of specific plant + mineral ingredients, featuring Organic Arrowroot, Baking Soda, Organic Tulsi, Wildcrafted Myrrh and Organic Oregano. These powerful natural ingredients work throughout the day and target bacteria at the source.

AER Essence

AER’s universal essential oil blends elevate the senses and counteract odor, delivering worry-free comfort. The three options are Ginger Grapefruit, Lavender Myrrh and Palo Santo Blood Orange.

TEST DRIVE THEIR 12 DAY TRIAL HERE

OUR BEAUTY NOTES: This novel formula is creating waves inside the beauty industry for its safe approach to highly effective order control. The options were perfectly created to delivery worry-free comfort to everyday deodorant. A little goes a long way and the formula applies smoothly with a desirable texture. 

 

Ingredients

 

Organic Maranta Arundinacea (Arrowroot) Root

Organic Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil

Sodium Bicarbonate (Baking Soda)

OrganicVirgin Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil

Silica

Glyceryl Undecylenate (Castor and Canola Oils)*

Organic Cera Alba (Beeswax)

Vapour's Proprietary Blend of Essential Oils

Tocopherol (Non GMO Vitamin E – Soy)

Organic Ocimum Sanctum (Tulsi) Leaf Extract

Wildcrafted Commiphora Myrrha (Myrrh) Gum Extract

Organic Oreganum Vulgare (Oregano) Leaf Extract

*Eco–Cert

 

Nt Wt 1.8oz /51g

entry.title: Revitalizing & Soothing Natural Sheet Mask
entry.summary:
Vendor: RE:FRESH
Type: Mask
Price: 6.00

Description

This 100% cruelty-free, non-toxic & EWG VERIFIED™ individually wrapped sheet mask is full of rich botanical extracts and effective ingredients. It features material that adheres well to the face, prevents quick evaporation, and delivers the serum deep into the skin for seriously refreshing and hydrating results.

NO Alcohol

NO Animal Testing

NO Artificial Color

NO Formaldehyde

NO Fragrance

NO Mineral Oil

NO Parabens

NO Phthalates

NO Silicone Oil

NO Sulfates

STAR INGREDIENTS

Betula Platyphylla Japonica Juice: Much more nutrient-rich than water, an ingredient commonly found in sheet masks. Full of amino acids and enzymes that intensely hydrate the skin and prevent oxidative stress such as UV rays and environmental pollution.

Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract: Antioxidant that provides protection against free radical damage to the skin and promotes skin repair via moisture retention and regeneration.

Limonia Acidissima Extract: Moisturizing agent that soothes the skin and evens out skin tones. Antioxidant that reduces wrinkles and fine lines by replenishing essential nutrients.

Sodium Hyaluronate: Smart nutrient that penetrates the skin, holds onto large amounts of water, and adjusts moisture absorption rate based on humidity. More effective than hyaluronic acid due to its smaller size which allows it to move more freely into deeper layers of the skin.

Lactobacillus Ferment: Natural microorganism that acidifies its surroundings, develops new antimicrobial peptides, and moisturizes the skin with a variety of proteins.

Our Beauty Notes: Finally a non-toxic sheet mask that doesn't leave a sticky residue. This slightly cooling sheet mask leaves your skin feeling refreshed, awake and hydrated. Ideal for all skin types and can be used weekly as part of regular skin routine. We are adding this to our regular beauty bags and at this price we highly suggest stocking up!

Use

Cleanse and dry face. Take out and gently unfold the mask. Place and smooth the mask onto the face. Leave on for 20 minutes and relax. Remove and discard the mask. Apply any remaining serum.

Made in Korea

Ingredients

Betula Platyphylla Japonica Juice, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Extract, Limonia Acidissima Extract, Zanthoxylum Piperitum Fruit Extract, Pulsatilla Koreana Extract, Lonicera Japonica (Honeysuckle) Flower Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Extract, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Fruit Extract, Usnea Barbata (Lichen) Extract, Morus Alba Bark Extract, Portulaca Oleracea Extract, Sodium Hyaluronate, Beta-Glucan, Carica Papaya (Papaya) Fruit Extract, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Water, Morinda Citrifolia Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Carbomer, Ascorbyl Glucoside (Vitamin C)

entry.title: Cold Pressed Raw Organic Coconut Oil Jar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kapuluan Coconut
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 34.00

Description 

As Seen In: Vogue, People, Refinery29, Byrdie & More 

100% RAW ORGANIC COLD PRESSED COCONUT OIL

  • Made from Fresh Coconuts on Rural Farms
  • Pressed without heat
  • The Finest Quality Coconut Oil for Skin & Hair
  • Pure & Natural for Beauty
  • Non-Greasy Silky Texture
  • Super-Fine for Fast Absorption
  • Highly Moisturizing
  • Rich in Nourishing Vitamin E and Antioxidants
  • Beautiful Subtle Coconut Aroma
  • No Discoloration

Our Favorite Ways to Use Kapuluan: 

  • Healthy Glowing Skin 
  • Mix with Coffee Grounds for Body Scrub 
  • The Perfect Shave (LeVert Favorite!)
  • Natural Lip Care
  • Under Eye Rescuer, Makeup Remover 
  • Healthy Teeth, Oil Pulling 
  • Baby Safe + Pregnancy Safe for Preventative Stretch Marks
  • Cuticle Care
  • Suncare (Applying & Eating) helps protect against environmental damage 
  • Good for Animals
  • Healthy Hair
  • Health & Wellness
  • Pure & Natural  

Kapuluan Coconut Oil is 100% Organic and made from only the freshest coconuts which are sourced from rural, organic farms in the Philippines. This Hand Pressed Coconut Oil is of the finest quality, with a wide range of health and skincare benefits.

Kapuluan coconut oil is all natural, pure, and exceptionally high grade for beauty and Personal Care. Silky smooth with a beautiful subtle coconut aroma, the oil absorbs quickly and is highly moisturizing, while rich in nourishing Vitamin E and antioxidants. Kapuluan coconut oil is a foundation for healthy, beautiful skin, and does not harm animals or the earth. 15 oz. 

OUR BEAUTY NOTES: This deeply clean coconut oil is a multi-tasking powerhouse that can be used from adding to morning coffee, as a shaving gel, on hair and skin and countless other ways (most listed above!). We deeply appreciate this brands commitment to sustainable farming and with each one sold - a coconut tree is planted. Bonus points for removing the label and up-cycling this glass jar into a makeup brush holder or spice jar to reduce waste. 

Directions

Kapuluan Coconut makes the Finest Quality Raw Coconut Oil.

Pure and Unprocessed for Beauty and Personal Care, our coconut oil is in it’s natural state, containing all the essential nutrients; we haven’t added anything or taken anything away.

Natural coconut oil reacts to carying temperatures. In cold weather it can get hard as ice. In hot weather it flows like water.

If it has hardened in cold temperature, it may be difficult to squeeze out of the tube. If so, just rub it in your hands or use neutral/warm water to soften it up! Always squeeze from the top to make it easier!

If the coconut oil is liquid in hot weather and you would prefer a lotion like consistency, just toss it in the fridge for a few minutes!

The truth is that modified coconut oil doesn’t contain the good stuff that makes coconut oil worth using in the first place. We love this nectar of tropical island gods and we support it’s mood swings and lack of consistent form.

Our best advice for Kapuluan Coconut Oil care is to store at room temperature and avoid extreme heat and direct sunlight.

entry.title: LUXURY ORGANIC ROSE DIAMOND LIP EXFOLIATOR
entry.summary:
Vendor: HENNÉ
Type: Makeup
Price: 22.00

Description

A complete 5-star experience to luxury lip care is complete with the Rose Diamond Lip Exfoliator. Henné has maintained it's high level of certified organic and luxurious standards with this step one in a two step at-home spa treatment, complete with the LUXURY ORGANIC LIP BALM for the most exquisite, soft, vibrant and lip plumping results. 

USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC
For external use only.
Store in a cool, dry place
Not tested on animals
Made in the USA
10ml | 0.35 fl oz

Our Beauty Notes: All we can is YES, YES! Part one to a complete lip luxury power duo is here. It's incredibly luxurious, gritty yet soft and deeply moisturizing lip exfoliator preps your lips without stripping them and prepping them for complete gorgeousness. 

Directions

Apply liberally on damp lips, exfoliating the area for one to two minutes and gently rinse. End with Henné Luxury Lip Balm for (the most) incredible results. 

Ingredients

Organic Cane Sugar, Organic Coconut Oil, Organic Beeswax, Organic Shea Butter, Organic Vanilla Flavoring, Organic Jojoba Oil, Organic Vitamin E Oil (Non-GMO), Organic Aronia Powder and Organic Rose Essential Oil.

entry.title: Agent Nateur N°4 Holi(Rose) Deodorant
entry.summary:
Vendor: AGENT NATEUR
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 24.00

Description 

h o l i ( r o s e )
N°4 d e o d o r a n t

Brand Seen In: VOGUE, Well+GOOD, InStyle Magazine, Byrdie + More
"HANDS DOWN...THE BEST NATURAL DEODORANT ON THE MARKET" - VOGUE.COM
 

SENSUAL and exotic blend of sacred sandalwood and heart opening rose. The smell is intoxicating and healing, while sandalwood is a pheromone it also acts as a natural deodorant, while the Number 4 derives its meaning from creation and it represents patience, trust, honesty and integrity. This beauty vibrates with passion, drive and mastery.

Both Shiva Rose and Agent Nateur perfected the deodorant for six months to release this beautiful scent and luxurious packaging as the perfect extension to an already cult-worthy brand. The premise of AGENT NATEUR d e o d o r a n t s are they formulated with only the finest ingredients including organic coconut oil, beeswax, sodium bicarbonate, avocado butter, sunflower butter, castor oil, raw organic honey and healing essential oils. The fragrance is beautiful and most importantly, AGENT NATEUR N°4  d e o d o r a n t  WORKS!

Our Beauty Notes: This is the most luxurious deodorant we've found, that's healthy and works effectively now with a stunning, subtly seductive scent. We tested the original through through Barre class, spin class and throughout the summer months to ensure that our LeVert Beauties get what we promise - effective, clean, luxury. This delivers the same effective power as the original with a lovely new, luxurious scent of rose and sandalwood. OUR TIP: People (us to!) sometimes have the tendency to add more product when somethings labeled "natural" and with this deodorant it's important to begin with less until you discover your balance to keep your clothes dry and deodorant free.  

Handmade in West Hollywood, Bottles Made in London. Large 1.7 oz

Ingredients

Ingredients: Organic coconut oil, sodium bicarbonate, beeswax, sunflower butter, avocado butter, castor oil, rose essential oil, sandalwood essential oil, love

  • Agent Nateur products are created with non-gmo, pesticide-free, food-grade ingredients available in order to be safe for those with even the most sensitive skin. If you have a history of sensitive skin or allergic reactions, please be sure to test body products on a small area inside your wrist for 2-3 days prior to using. Agent Nateur cannot guarantee that customers will not experience skin reactions to their products and cannot be held responsible should any occur.  If you are sensitive to baking soda, we recommend that you try an apple cider vinegar wash prior to using our deodorant.  Apply apple cider vinegar and warm water to a towel and wash your underarms before applying to equal out skins pH.
HOW TO USE 

A little goes a long way....you don't need much of Agent Nateur to keep you smelling luxurious throughout the day. Give yourself one month to transition from antiperspirant to this natural deodorant if you develop a rash. Sometimes irritation is a sign that the body is detoxing from the aluminum in antiperspirant and other times it's a sign that your body's PH is too high for the baking soda in the deodorant. Shave the night before applying it if your skin is sensitive and begin by applying to clean skin.

entry.title: Grapefruit Citrus Bath Soak
entry.summary:
Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 28.00

Description

PLEASE NOTE: BACK-ORDERED WITH BRAND. ALL PRE-ORDERS TO SHIP IMMEDIATELY ONCE BACK IN STOCK (TBD). THANK YOU FOR YOUR PATIENCE AS THEY CREATE MORE!

This blend of Pink Himalayan, Dead Sea, Atlantic and Pacific Sea Salts is paired with refreshing citrus essential oils designed to detoxify skin, improve circulation, relieve aching muscles and deliver softer, more supple skin

Our Beauty Notes: We find this ideal after workouts to revive overworked muscles, when anxious or stressed to relieve overactive minds and simply for pulling out daily environmental toxins from everyday exposures. Bath soaks are simple to use and incredibly beneficial to your weekly well-being. 

Ingredients 

Sodium Chloride (Atlantic Sea Salt), Sodium Chloride (Pacific Sea Salt), Sodium Chloride (Himalayan Sea Salt), Sodium Chloride (Dead Sea Salt), Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil

It is ideal for all skin types, ask a physician before using if pregnant and/or nursing. 

Directions 

Draw Warm Bath. Add 2-3 TBSP of salt mixture directly into water stream. Agitate and allow salts to dissolve. Enter bath, soak and recenter.

entry.title: LUXURY LIP TINT (BARE)
entry.summary:
Vendor: HENNÉ
Type: Makeup
Price: 21.00

Description

A delicate nude that provides the perfect barely-there flush of color on the lips. Apply one layer for a sheer hint of color or add additional layers for a more opaque look.

For external use only. Store in a cool, dry place.
Not tested on animals.
Made in USA.

5ml / 0.17 fl oz

Our Beauty Notes: A hybrid where our favorite lip balm meets subtle everyday color? Call it perfection for all skintones.

Directions

Apply one layer for a sheer hint of color or add more layers for a stronger tint. Reapply when needed.

Tip: Use Henné's Lip Exfoliator prior to applying the Luxury Lip Tint to ensure the lips are flake-free and that the color goes on smoothly.

Ingredients

ORGANIC COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, ORGANIC RICINUS COMMUNIS (CASTOR) SEED OIL, ORGANIC SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, ORGANIC CERA ALBA (BEESWAX), ORGANIC PERSEA AMERICANA (AVOCADO) OIL, EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX, TITANIUM DIOXIDE, IRON OXIDE, TOCOPHEROL (VITAMIN E).
88% ORGANIC

Experience luxury every day with this 100% natural and moisturizing organic lip balm. Carefully chosen with the most nourishing and luxurious ingredients to ensure you get everything your lips need and not a thing more. 

USDA CERTIFIED ORGANIC
For external use only.
Store in a cool, dry place

10ml | 0.35 fl oz

Our Beauty Notes: Can a lip balm really be that game-changing? YUP. Hennè created the most luxurious lip balm that your lips won't crave - but you will. You'll never have healthier, more properly moisturized or better looking lips then after experiencing this everyday lip balm. 

Directions

Apply liberally on the lips for maximum benefits. Also suitable for use on dry areas such as hands, elbows, nose, heels and anywhere else that requires additional moisture. 

Ingredients

Organic Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Organic Cera Alba (Beeswax), Organic Persea Americana (Avocado) Oil, Organic Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) Fruit, Organic Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Organic Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).

entry.title: All-Natural Eyelash Enhancing Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: PLUME
Type: Makeup
Price: 95.00

Description  

This clinically tested eyelash and brow enhancer just won us over.

This proprietary formula is designed to have a duel effect on the appearance of your lashes and brows: 1st by supporting the health and hydration of each hair follicle & 2nd by supporting the longevity of those hair follicles allowing your lashes to grow longer and last longer before naturally falling out. 

When it comes to the health, hydration and longevity of all living organisms (like the hair cells in your lashes) nothing compares to the effectiveness and purity of plant-derived ingredients. Similar to juicing fresh fruits and vegetables, think of Plume as a botanical super-juice for the hair follicles of your lashes and brows. 

95% reported increased length and/or density

View Before & After Tab from customers (more to come).

This delivers longer lashes in just weeks and is FREE FROM...

  • Parabens

  • Sulfates

  • Phthalates

  • Hormones and Prostaglandins

  • Artificial fragrances

  • Artificial dyes

  • Gluten

  • Synthetic ingredients of any kind 

Safe and Gentle on Sensitive Eyes

Two Ingredients with 'chemical-sounding' names explained:

Sucrose Laurate: Emulsifier, naturally obtained from hydrogenation and esterification of sugar cane and vegetable oil.

Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate: A natural, food grade, emulsifier derived from stearic acid (plant-derived) and the sodium salt of lactic acid.

In addition to their plant-derived active ingredients, they use only plant-derived emulsifiers and stabilizers as well; meaning their product stays 100% natural across its entire formulation. The type and quality of non-active ingredients used in a cosmetic product (emulsifiers, thickeners, surfactants) are often overlooked, however, they can have a significant impact on how well the overall formula performs!

THINK DIRTY APP SCORE = 0 

Think Dirty App Score Is = 0 as (0-3) are products that do not contain any ingredients which have a documented potential negative health impact. 

Our Beauty Notes: We are constantly on the hunt for clean innovation, we were humbly surprised by the ingredients and the effective nature of this lash enhancing product. We admire Lauren, the founder's vision for the merriment of clean, effective beauty and health. This is a staple in our Beauty Bag. 

Size: .17 fl oz/5 ml

 

Ingredients 

Organic Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Organic Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Tussilago Farfara (Coltsfoot) Flower Extract, Achillea Millefolium (Yarrow) Extract, Cinchona Succirubra Bark Extract, Water, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Glycerin, Honey Extract, Prunus Amygdalus (Sweet Almond) Oil, Sucrose Laurate, Sodium Stearoyl Lactylate, Nasturtium Officinale (Watercress) Extract, Tropaeolium Majus (Indian Cress) Extract, Xanthan Gum, Coleus Forskohlii Root Oil, Carya Ovata (Hickory) Bark Extract.

Organic Aloe Vera: Rich in vitamins and minerals, aloe vera has long been recognized for its moisturizing, healing, anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties.

Organic Castor Oil: Nourishes hair follicles with omega fatty acids, vitamin E and proteins. Castor oil is known to have anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties thus protecting the area around your eyes from harmful micro-organisms and potential infection.

Vitamin E: A potent anti-oxidant and effective moisturizer.Honey Extract: Exhibits natural moisturizing properties, fortifies hair and skin with vitamins and minerals, and increases blood circulation for optimal health around the eye region.

Honey Extract:  A powerful humectant, hair follicles treated with honey extract retain more moisture. Also known for its anti-irritant and anti-microbial characteristics.

Watercress (Nasturtium officinale) and Indian cress (Tropaeolum majus) have been rigorously studied to show that these extracts can help hair produce keratin, a key factor in the strength, and ultimately length, of your hair.

Coltsfoot flower (Tussilago farfara), yarrow flower (Achillea millefolium), and Peruvian quina bark (Cinchona succirubra) combine to help stimulate cell renewal, feeding the proteic metabolism of hair and working against oxidative stress. The result: a powerful way to promote the longevity of your lash and brow follicles.

Hair, including eyelashes and eyebrows, is made up of 90% keratin. The minerals that are abundant within our proprietary blend, such as zinc and magnesium, have been shown in clinical studies to help hair produce a higher quality of keratin. This translates into stronger follicles in your lashes and brows.

And eyelashes that have a longer life have more time to grow longer!

Use

Shake well and apply nightly to clean upper and lower eyelash line, brows if desired.  

Before & After

entry.title: Le Baume
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jordan Seban Hair
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 38.00

Description

Brand Seen in StyleCaster

Le Baume ( French for The Balm ) is a lightweight conditioning leave-in treatment. The luxurious and rich velvet-cream texture melt in hands and once on the hair, it moisturizes, protects and repairs. The hair is soft, shiny and healthier.

The silicon-free and weightless formula is infused with L’Huile Signature oil blend, as well as Silk Proteins to strengthen, soften and tame frizz, all while protecting hair from damage.

Le Baume features ingredients from around the world, as well as a precise blend of essential oils, promoting natural hair growth. Gotu Kola extract, a plant from India, rich in minerals, replenish healthy shine and gloss.
Horsetail extract, rich in silica, helps bind Le Baume’s protein blend to the hair.
Aloe Vera, a natural conditioner, smooth the hair without a sticky residue.

Le Baume is applied on towel-dried hair before styling as a pre-blow dry lotion, as well as on dry hair, for touch-up.

Apply a peanut size amount on towel-dried hair, or more depending on the lengths. Proceed with blow-dry and heat styling. The hair is silky, shiny and hydrated. The style is locked-in and protected from heat damage and humidity.

OUR BEAUTY NOTES: Sister product to the original, and popular, L'Huile this offers a lightweight option for deeply effective conditioning, while being extremely lightweight on the hair. This includes the highly prized seven essentials, Jordan Seban signatures, leaving your hair nurtured and healthier than before. We appreciates its multi-use for damp or dry hair and even the skin. Jordan Seban never disappoints.

Size: 4.0oz

Ingredients

Aqua (Deionized Water), Carrageenan, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice (Organic Aloe), Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil (Organic Argan Oil), Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil (Macadamia Nut Oil), Persea Gratissima Oil (Avocado Oil), Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (Organic Jojoba Oil), Butyrospermum Parkii Butter (Shea Butter), Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis Oil (Sweet Almond Oil), Bursera Fagaroides Wood Oil (Linaloe), Citrus Aurantium Flower Oil (Neroli), Citrus Aurantium Leaf Oil (Neroli), Citrus Reticulata Peel Oil (Petitgrain), Amyris Balsamifera Bark Oil, Copaifera Species Resin Oils, Dipterocarpus Turbinatus Balsam Oil, Santalum Album Oil (Sandalwood), Santalum Spicata Wood Oil, Silk Protein Amino Acid Blend of Sodium Pca, Sodium Lactate, Arginine, Aspartic Acid, Glycine, Alanine, Serine, Valine, Isoleucine, Proline, Threonine, Histidine, Phenylalanine, Foeniculum Vulgare Fruit Extract (Fennel), Centella Asiatica Extract (Organic Gotu Kola), Equisetum Arvense Extract (Horsetail), Geranium Maculatum Extract (Wild Geranium), Taraxacum Officinale Extract (Organic Dandelion), Hydroxyethyllcellulose*, Potassium Sorbate*, Sodium Benzoate*, Ethylhexylglycerin.*Plant Derived

On thinner hair, it gives body and hold the style. On thicker hair, it gives definition and eliminates frizz.

For a natural, effortless look, apply on wet hair and let the hair air dry. For curly hair, apply on tower-dried hair, and form curl with fingers. Dry with a diffuser or air dry.

Apply anytime on dry hair to refresh and nourish.Designed Paris, Made in the USA.

Mult-Tasking Specifics:

Use L'Huile as a pre-shampoo treatment: For very dry or thicker hair, pour a small amount (dime size or smaller) into your hands. Apply on lengths and ends, brush it through. For a lighter pre-shampoo treatment, mix a small amount with your favorite hair mask. The longer you let it sit, the deeper the restorative effect. Follow with your regular shampoo and conditioner.

Use L'Huile as a hair protection: L'Huile is the perfect natural hair protector. To protect your hair against the harsh effects of chlorinated pool water and sea salt, apply a small amount on hair before swimming. Acting as the hair natural protecting layer, apply a few drops of L'Huile on lengths and ends before coloring or highlighting your hair to lessen damage and breakage.

Use L'Huile on the skin: On skin, this restores moisture and radiance to the driest skin. In just a few minutes, L'Huile is naturally absorbed in to the skin, leaving behind a satin-soft finish. Massage a few drops directly on skin for maximum nourishing power. Combine L'Huile to your body cream, moisturizer to enhance and deepen the nourishing effect or as a cuticle treatment

entry.title: L'Huile
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jordan Seban Hair
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 48.00

Description

Brand Seen in StyleCaster

L'Huile for HAIR & SKIN

L'Huile (French for 'The Oil') is a unique blend of seven organic oils, combined at the perfect ratio to create the ultimate, multi-purpose nourishing treatment for the hair and skin. Selected for their moisturizing and varying penetrating properties, they work synergistically with one another to promote the optimal benefits to your hair and skin.

L'Huile oils are extracted without the use of any chemicals or solvents and most of them are cold-pressed. This delicate process preserves the oils' essential fatty acids, minerals and nutritional-rich properties, such as Vitamin A, B, & E, infusing the hair and skin with powerful antioxidant. L'Huile helps restor the natural hydro-lipid layer of the hair that has been damaged from years of styling, color treating and over processing. It deeply nourishes, softens and protects the driest hair. And because of its pure and concentrated formulation, a little goes a very long way.

Sourced from the most exclusive organic purveyors from around the world, including Morocco, Kenya, India, Israel and Mexico, their amazing natural aroma are brought out with a soupçon of Jordan's signature fragrance, creating the one-of-a-kind smell.

Designed Paris, Made in the USA.

OUR BEAUTY NOTES: Our promise is to align you with the best in luxury, non-toxic beauty - it's what we are all about. We couldn't wait to get our hands on this (now) favorite. This unique, luxurious hair & skin oil can be used as a pre-shampoo treatment to help manage dry, over processed hair, as an after cleansing routine, as a pre-pool or ocean treatment to protect hair from chlorine or sea salt and also on the skin as a deeply hydrating body oil moisturizer. The creator, Jordan Seban is a mastermind and we can't get enough! Use a small amount as this is one of the most powerfully hydrating oils we've come across - a little goes a long way. OUR TIP: Add to the bottom two inches of dry hair 'ends' or 'tips' before bed, sleep in it, and wash well in the morning to reveal incredibly hydrated and healthy hair.

Mult-Tasking Specifics:

Use L'Huile as a pre-shampoo treatment: For very dry or thicker hair, pour a small amount (dime size or smaller) into your hands. Apply on lengths and ends, brush it through. For a lighter pre-shampoo treatment, mix a small amount with your favorite hair mask. The longer you let it sit, the deeper the restorative effect. Follow with your regular shampoo and conditioner.

Use L'Huile as a hair protection: L'Huile is the perfect natural hair protector. To protect your hair against the harsh effects of chlorinated pool water and sea salt, apply a small amount on hair before swimming. Acting as the hair natural protecting layer, apply a few drops of L'Huile on lengths and ends before coloring or highlighting your hair to lessen damage and breakage.

Use L'Huile on the skin: On skin, this restores moisture and radiance to the driest skin. In just a few minutes, L'Huile is naturally absorbed in to the skin, leaving behind a satin-soft finish. Massage a few drops directly on skin for maximum nourishing power. Combine L'Huile to your body cream, moisturizer to enhance and deepen the nourishing effect or as a cuticle treatment 

 

 

Ingredients

1 Sweet Almond Oil * Prunus dulcis
Extracted exclusively from edible almonds, this luxuriously nutty oil is ultra-rich in Vitamin E and attributed to promoting overall hair and skin health.

2 Avocado Oil * Persea americana
Rich in saturated and mono-saturated fats, avocado oil easily penetrates the hair cuticle, providing support to and strengthening the hair fiber. Avocado oil is the perfect oil to help your hair retain moisture, as well as revive dry damaged hair from over styling and environmental wear and tear.

3 Jojoba Oil * Simmondsia chinensis
The properties of jojoba oil mimic that of sebum, the naturally occurring oil your skin and scalp produces. Jojoba oil acts as a hair protector, scalp moisturizer, and oil regulator.

4 Argan Oil * Argania spinosa
Also known as the Moroccan oil because of its origin, Argan oil is our multi-tasking miracle moisturizer that has been used for centuries for its unique benefits for the skin.

5 Macadamia Oil * Macadamia intergrifolia
Macadamia oil features one of the highest amount of omega-7 fatty acids compared to other nut oil, providing exceptional nourishment for the skin.

6 Shea Nut Oil * Vittellaria paradoxa
Light in texture and carefully extracted from Shea butter, Shea nut oil is more rare and features lighter, highly concentrated moisturizing properties than its well-known butter counterpart.

7 Safflower Oil * Carthamus tinctorius
Safflower oil features high amounts of oleic acid, making it light and easy to penetrate hair and skin.

Fragrance is derived from a blend of organic essential oils Neroli and Orange Blossom.

entry.title: Cream Blush in Precious
entry.summary:
Vendor: Kjaer Weis
Type: Makeup
Price: 32.00 - 56.00 (2 variants)

Description

Brand Seen In: ELLE, Vogue, InStyle, Marie Claire & More

"Kjaer Weis will change how you think about organic makeup" - InStyle Magazine

Precious is a light pastel colored Cream Blush that is the peachier sister to Embrace. It gives a flattering pop of pastel with a peach undertone and the signature Kjaer Weis glow, also perfect on the lips as a lip tint for a fresh, feminine look. 

- Blends beautifully on the skin, using either fingers or a brush
- Produced in Italy
- CCPB Certified Organic
- Cruelty Free NOT tested on animals
- Gluten FREE
- This product is not vegan
- Refill Option 
- NO artificial ingredients, such as petroleum, parabens, artificial coloring and fragrance, petrochemical emulsifiers

Our Beauty Notes: This is our all-time favorite blush shade from Kajer Weis. A pigmented peach that, in our opinion, flirts the line with creating a sun-kissed, spring hue. One of our favorite things about this cream blush is it works well on all skin types - all ages. That's the wonderful thing about cream blush. Kjaer Weis, in particular, delivers this to the next level. Pure luxury.  

Use 

The Kjaer Weis Cream Blush goes on beautifully when applied with the fingers, especially gently dabbed on the apple of the cheek. It leaves the wearer with a fresh-faced, “just back from a run” look. The cream blush can also be applied with a large (artificial hair) brush, gently swept over the cheek area.

Ingredients 
Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet
Almond) oil, Mica, Ricinus, Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax, Cera
Alba (Beeswax), Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil
, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rose Hip) Seed Oil, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Gardenia Florida Fruit Extract,
Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Ammonium Glycyrrhizate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dextrin, Gallic Acid, Glyceryl Stearate, CI77891 (Titanium Dioxide), CI 77492
(Iron Oxide), CI 77491 (Iron Oxide), CI 75470 (Carmine). Caution
– Contains Carmine
organically grown
* naturally contained in the used essential oils
Tips 

Blend from the apples of your cheeks out toward your ears in natural light to ensure a streak less finish.

entry.title: Kennedy Lashes (MODERATE)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Battington Lashes
Type: Makeup
Price: 26.00

Description

MODERATE LENGTH
MODERATE VOLUME

  • 100% silk in a traditional strip lash formation

A note about silk:

  • Handmade
  • Light-weight
  • Durable (Up to 25 applications with proper care!)
Care

Silk lashes should be given the same care and attention as you would a fine silk blouse, avoid showering or sleeping in your lashes in order for them to last. Always store your lashes where they won't get crushed or dusty when not in use. A good rule of thumb is: If they're not on your face - they're in the case! When you remove the lashes immediately peel off the remaining glue on the band and place lashes back in the Battington Box for future use. 

Application
  1. Use your trusty eyelash curler to help match the bend in the silk lashes so everything looks like one.
  2. Remove the lashes from the pack and hold them against your eye to measure them against the length of your own natural lash line. False lashes are often too long for your eye, so ensure you cut the strips to fit.
  3. Apply a light coat of mascara to your natural lashes (before application). 
  4. Draw a thin line of (separate) lash glue to the band of your lashes.
  5. Wait for glue to become tacky (30-60 seconds). It is very important to wait 30 seconds for the adhesive to become tacky before applying the false lashes.
  6. Place the lash band as close to your natural lashline as possible. Hold them firmly in place until adhesive is set.

Our Beauty Notes: You just cannot go wrong with Kennedy's modest length and thickness, this is our team go-to when false lashes are needed.

entry.title: Blemish Lotion
entry.summary:
Vendor: INDIE LEE
Type: Skincare
Price: 26.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

This talc-free, overnight spot treatment and drying lotion treats acne and blemishes, reducing redness, irritation, and inflammation. 1oz.   

    Our Beauty Notes: No way we're ever without a blemish spot treatment, right? This is a must have for our Beauty Bag and one we use to help banish pesky or hormonal pimples. 

    Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

    Ingredients 

    100 Natural: Purified Water, Isopropyl Alcohol, Colloidal Sulfur, Zinc Oxide, Salicylic Acid, Magnesium, Aluminum Silicate (Clay), Camphor, Iron Oxide

    Use

    Do Not Shake; allow product to settle to the base of the bottle. Dip a cotton swab into the bottom sediment and dab onto affected areas. Allow product to sit overnight before removing with warm water. For external use only.

entry.title: Brightening Cleanser
entry.summary:
Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Skincare
Price: 32.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

This simple, multitasking cleanser is designed to naturally wash away impurities (including eye makeup!) to leave skin soft, refreshed, and luminous. A blend of natural ingredients - including lycopene and hydrolyzed wheat protein - make it ideal for cleansing, hydrating, tightening, firming, and complexion control. 

    Cheer up more than just your complexion: This antioxidant rich formula exudes a light strawberry aroma, which brightens the skin and the senses without overpowering.

    Multi-tasking product: When applied to face and left to sit for 5-10 minutes (before rinsing), this complexion clearer acts as an exfoliating mask. Also removes your makeup in the same step: It gently removes makeup without stripping the skin of necessary nutrients. It’s also a great formula for cleaning makeup brushes!  4 oz.   

    Our Beauty Notes: This favorite Indie Lee Cleanser is simple yet effective in skincare multitasking, its gel-like cleanser tackles stubborn eye makeup with one pump, while two pumps rid an entire face of makeup and dirt. With the ability to work as an exfoliator if left on to "sit" on the skin and smells like the things dreams are made off. Clear, bright and younger looking skin is in your future. 

    Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

    Ingredients 

    Purified Water, Decyl Glucoside (Veg. Oils & Sugar), Disodium Coco-Glucoside Citrate, Coco Glucoside Oleaste (Coconut and Sunflower Oil), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein*, Xanthan Gum, Fragaria Chiloensis Seed Oil (Strawberry), Lycopene, Phenoxyethanol and Ethylhexylglycerin (both derived from natural sources).  *Note: contains gluten. 

    Use

    Apply a small amount of cleanser to wet face. Use with a wet cotton pad to remove eye makeup. Rinse completely with water. Follow with toner and moisturizer. For external use only.

entry.title: Coconut Citrus Body Scrub
entry.summary:
Vendor: Indie Lee
Type: Bath + Body
Price: 38.00

Description
Brand Seen In: Cosmopolitan, Vogue, Refinery29, Zoe Report, Today Show, Lucky, Marie Claire, Allure, Style, Glamour, ELLE, Bazaar & More 

"Certified Chic" - Vogue 

"The Most Inspiring Beauty Brand Ever" - Cosmopolitan Magazine 

"Ladies, the secret to smooth, sexy skin this summer is the perfect scrub. I'm obsessed with this one! It has a phenomonal coconut-citrus smell and will really slough off that dry skin of yours. Have I mentioned that the fresh, beachy smell will transport your sense to a tropical paradise? Believe me, your skin will feel so baby-soft straight out of the shower!" - Model & Actress, Molly Sims  

"Lee created the Coconut Citrus scrub to relieve skin dryness caused by chemotherapy - it's that gentle." - Martha Stewart 

This beloved body scrub is an intoxicating and all-natural blend of coconut, lemongrass, lemon balm, jojoba and vanilla. Blissfully buff skin to it’s smoothest with the gentle sugar texture which expertly exfoliates to leave skin silky soft and supple. Perfect for year round use.Best used on body and lips (but please resist the urge to taste!). Non-irritating formula great for all skin types. 8oz. 

    Our Beauty Notes: The smell, the feeling, the results - divine! 

    Indie Lee tugged at our heart strings initially with her story of overcoming a brain tumor to discover the link between conventional beauty and its potential health harm. After learning about her story, she then struck us with a genius product line that conquers disbelieve in clean beauty. Since regaining her health, she has taken the clean beauty world by storm creating the chic, effective and modern (right up our alley!): Indie Lee. 

    Note: During shipping your scrub may harden in cold temperatures and melt in hot temperatures. That is normal.  Before first use, allow it to sit at room temperature for a few hours.  After opening, mix scrub with a scoop or spoon before use. 

    Ingredients 

    Saccharum Officinarum (sugarcane), Coco Nucifera (coconut) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (jojoba) Oil, Melissa Officinalis (lemon balm), Cymbopogon Citratus (lemongrass) and Vanilla Planifolia (vanilla).

    Use

    Soften sugar scrub with the steam of the shower, then simply scoop desired amount and massage onto skin. Best used weekly, prior to shaving. Rinse with warm water after use and store at room temperature to prevent hardening.

entry.title: Finishing Powder Brush

Designed in the iconic ILIA finish, this brush’s soft bristles are made with high-grade, synthetic Taklon, an easy-to-clean, cruelty-free material. Wash brush with mild soap and warm water regularly. Designed for Fade Into You (Translucent Powder)

Ideal used with Finishing Powder Brush

The six new Foundation shades range from light to dark and are named to match sand colors from various deserts from around the world.
